DisplayName: Minimum time until the next weather lottery (in-game seconds)
Description: Specify the minimum time to the next weather lottery in in-game seconds. When transitioning to this weather
Minimum: the time to the next weather will be a random time between the minimum and maximum.

DisplayName: Maximum time until the next weather lottery (in-game seconds)
Description: Specify the maximum time until the next weather lottery in in-game seconds. When transitioning to this weather
Minimum: the time to the next weather will be a random time between the minimum and maximum.
